name: Super Golf Zombie Survival 2018 (LD41)
description:
[How to play] Hit rocks and trees with your golf ball to collect stones and woods. You can stun zombies with the golf ball and attack them by throwing stones and woods. Items can be selected using number keys.

Item 1: long-range golf club, click and hold to choose a hit strength

 Item 2: close-range golf club, click and hold to choose a hit strength

 Item 3: wood(1 damage), aim with a mouse and click to shoot at zombies

 Item 4: stone(1 damage), aim with a mouse and click to shoot at zombies
